title: Conservation of Energy
text: Remember that energy must be conserved in our system. Also remember that the problem states the surface is frictionless.

title: Conservation of Energy
text: There is no inital potential energy thus the equation we need to solve is the $$KE_{initial}$$ $$=$$ $$KE_{final}$$ $$+PE_{final}$$.

title: Solve For $$V_f$$
text: Solve for $$V_f$$ where $$V_f$$ is the final velocity: $$\frac{1}{2} 2^2$$ $$=$$ (1/2)*(V_f**2)+ $$9.8\times0.18$$.
